quote: The ultimate reason for setting goals is to entice you to become the person it takes to achieve them
author: Jim Rohn

quote: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quote: Every goal first started as something in our mind. You have it all within you!
author: Deborah Day,  BE HAPPY NOW!

quote: Just pick a goal and stick to it―no big complicated secret.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich,  Smile Anyway: Quotes, Verse, & Grumblings for Every Day of the Year

quote: If you have a goal, write it down. If you do not write it down, you do not have a goal - you have a wish.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: A goal is important, but what you become to achieve that goal is much more important.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Goals are dreams with a deadline.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: The only thing standing between you and your goal is the bullshit story you keep telling yourself as to why you can't achieve it.
author: Jordan Belfort

quote: It is important that when we make a resolution, or establish a goal, that we take the ACTION necessary to accomplish that goal.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: You cannot score a goal when you are sitting on the bench. To do so, you have to dress up and enter the game.
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: The way to achieve your goals is step by step, you just need to build enough track, to be ahead of the train."~ John Milton Lawrence
author: John Milton Lawrence

quote: Always set small, realistic goals that you know you can achieve first. But don't give up on the bigger ones that may seem too far from your reach.
author: W.D. Lady

quote: Just start off with the same goals in mind. If you have the same values, same goals then you'll be on track for the same future.
author: Angelina Jolie

quote: Don't set your goals by what other people deem important.
author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu,  The Prince and the Pauper

quote: If you are able to focus unswervingly on your goals, then all that you desire will become yours.
author: Steve Backley,  The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: Always strive to aim for the highest peak of the goals in life you have set, this way if you manage to reach even half way toward a goal, landing in the middle is not such a bad place to end up.
author: Victoria Addino

quote: Although goals are important, having a plan of action is vital to the success of those goals. Having a goal with no plan of action is like wanting to travel to a new destination without having a map.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Don’t set a goal to avoid pain or escape suffering; set a goal to live in joy and bliss to make this world joyful and blissful.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: sometimes you don't need a goal in life, you don't need to know the big picture. you just need to know what you're going to do next!
author: Sophie Kinsella,  The Undomestic Goddess

quote: Super-ambitious goals tend to be unifying and energizing to people; but only if they believe there's a chance of success.
author: Peter Diamandis

quote: Difficulties increase the nearer we get to the goal.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: My number one goal is to love, support and be there for my son.
author: Farrah Fawcett

quote: Happiness is not a goal...it's a by-product of a life well lived.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Be aware that how you feel has a direct impact on your thinking process. When we set standards for ourselves they seem objective, but standards and goal-setting are totally subjective and personal."From The Biology of Success.
author: Robert Arnot

quote: You measure the size of the accomplishment by the obstacles you have to overcome to reach your goals.
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: Think little goals and expect little achievements. Think big goals and win big success.
author: David Joseph Schwartz

quote: Reach high, for stars lie hidden in you. Dream deep, for every dream precedes the goal.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: My motivation and aspiration is the same, being number one or being number five. So that's the truth. And my goal is the same - it's to always be happy playing, it's to enjoy the game and improve always.
author: Rafael Nadal

quote: Do you want to know what one of the secrets to achieving all of your goals is? You’ve got to be committed.
author: Steve Backley,  The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: The world’s greatest achievers have been those who have always stayed focussed on their goals and have been consistent in their efforts.
author: Roopleen,  Words to inspire the winner in YOU

quote: Money. The ultimate motivation. The ultimate way of keeping score.
author: Michael Connelly,  Chasing the Dime

quote: We must walk consciously only part way toward our goal, and then leap in the dark to our success.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: If you set your goals ridiculously high and it's a failure, you will fail above everyone else's success.
author: James Cameron

quote: We make our purpose.
author: Carl Sagan,  The Varieties of Scientific Experience: A Personal View of the Search for God

quote: Whatever beginning goals you set for yourself, following through on them will build momentum and a sense of achievement and those small success will point the way to bigger ones
author: Pamela Glass Kelly,  From Inspiration to Publication: How to Succeed as a Children's Writer: Advice from 15 Award Winning Writers

quote: Our goals can only be reached through a vehicle of a plan, in which we must fervently believe, and upon which we must vigorously act. There is no other route to success.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Your path should be lighted with love and trust, your purpose should be clear, and your goal should be the light post.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Let today be the day you stop having conflict between your actions and your goals and finally align your greatest intent with your purposeful actions, creating a universal symphony serenading your success!
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Desire is the key to motivation, but it’s determination and commitment to an unrelenting pursuit of your goal - a commitment to excellence - that will enable you to attain the success you seek.
author: Mario Andretti

quote: There are many goals but one path - the path of compassion.
author: Amit Ray,  Nonviolence: The Transforming Power

quote: I want you to have big dreams, big goals. I want you to strive to achieve them. But I don't want to see you beating yourself up every time you make a mistake.
author: Kelley Armstrong,  The Gathering

quote: The person who makes a success of living is the one who sees his goal steadily and aims for it unswervingly.
author: Cecil B. DeMille

quote: Peace is not only the goal, it is the game itself.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: If you've delayed achieving your goals, have you ever asked yourself, "What's stopping you?
author: Elizabeth Parker,  Bark Out Loud! Motivational Quotes Inspired by Dogs

quote: Your determination and actions define your destination.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Success is the progressive realization of predetermined, worthwhile, personal goals.
author: Paul J. Meyer

quote: It is born in mind that the tragedy of life does not lie in not reaching the goal. The tragedy of life lies in having no goal to reach.
author: Benjamin E. Mays

quote: Desire is the key to motivation, but it's determination and commitment to an unrelenting pursuit of your goal - a commitment to excellence - that will enable you to attain the success you seek.
author: Mario Andretti

quote: Desire is the key to motivation, but it's the determination and commitment to unrelenting pursuit of your goal - a commitment to excellence - that will enable you to attain the success you seek.
author: Mario Andretti
